thread.title: Cleveland-area pastor cancels his Chicago 'gang summit'
thread.title_full: Cleveland-area pastor cancels his Chicago 'gang summit'

author: Associated Press
title: Cleveland-area pastor cancels his Chicago 'gang summit'
text: A Cleveland-area minister who told President Donald Trump that Chicago's "top gang thugs" wanted to meet with him to find ways to reduce gun violence said the decision to cancel the event had nothing to do with criticism from activists in the city.
